crafting_mercenary.name: Master Crafter
crafting_mercenary.description: A master craftsman who helps you create items faster and gain more experience. Provides bonuses for 100 crafting actions.

foraging_mercenary.name: Foraging Expert
foraging_mercenary.description: An expert forager who helps you collect materials more efficiently. Provides bonuses for 100 foraging actions.

mage_mercenary.name: Hired Mage
mage_mercenary.description: A spellcaster who provides magical support in combat. Fights alongside you for 50 battles.

mining_mercenary.name: Mining Assistant
mining_mercenary.description: A skilled miner who helps you gather resources faster. Provides bonuses for 100 mining actions.

rogue_mercenary.name: Hired Rogue
rogue_mercenary.description: A swift assassin who strikes from the shadows. Fights alongside you for 50 battles.

warrior_mercenary.name: Hired Warrior
warrior_mercenary.description: A skilled fighter who joins your party in combat. Fights alongside you for 50 battles.

berserker_quest.name: Rage of the Warrior
berserker_quest.description: Demonstrate your ferocity by completing the Orc Encampment dungeon.

guardian_quest.name: Shield of the Protector
guardian_quest.description: Prove your defensive prowess by completing the Ogre Stronghold dungeon.

necromancer_quest.name: Gathering of Souls
necromancer_quest.description: Collect 50 Soul Essences to demonstrate your connection to the realm of death.

ranger_quest.name: Hunter's Mark
ranger_quest.description: Prove your tracking skills by slaying 50 wolves in combat.

swashbuckler_quest.name: Duel of the Daring
swashbuckler_quest.description: Show your swashbuckling prowess by completing the Bandit Camp dungeon.

wizard_quest.name: Path of the Arcane
wizard_quest.description: Prove your mastery of arcane magic by completing the Eternal Library dungeon.
